column2: Elsevier maintains this Compendex Source List (“Source List”) as a courtesy to those who may choose to access the Source List.

Elsevier makes no warranty whatsoever, including without limitation, that the Source List will be error-free in terms of accuracy, completeness, reliability, availability, suitability, quality, non-infringement, operation or result obtained from the use of the Source List.

These Terms and Conditions apply to the use of the sole official and only authorized version of the Source List which may only be found at https://www.elsevier.com/solutions/engineering-village/content.
